name: Quarantine (itch) (soupWench)
description: Quarantine was the first 3D game I developed within Unity. During the 6 month period, I created a vertical and high-fidelity version of the game to focus on the core aspect of the assessment which was programming and functionality. I created this game during my second year at Brunel University.  I created over 30 C# scripts for this project and made sure the story and level design were smooth-flowing and coherent. This was a solo project
